name: 2022 9th International Conference on Mechatronics, Electronics and Automation Engineering
content: Publicationï¼š After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, and all the accepted papers of ICMEAE will be published in Conference Proceedings as a special chapter, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. Selected papers from the conference will be invited to submit in International Journal of Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Telecommunications (IJEETC) . Indexed in Scopus, etc.
